programme.title: The 39 Steps
programme.desc: Rupert Penry-Jones stars in this adaptation of John Buchan's classic novel, set in 1914. Engineer Richard Hannay is bored and restless in London - until he meets Scudder, who claims to be a British spy. When the agent is killed in his flat, Hannay is thrown headlong into adventure, forced to go on the run under suspicion of murder. Fleeing to Scotland, with police and spies on his tail, he teams up with feisty suffragette Victoria Sinclair, and although they fail to hit it off, the couple become increasingly reliant on each other as they race to unmask a traitor and save Great Britain from German invasion. Action thriller, co-starring Eddie Marsan and Lydia Leonard.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: The unconventional hero investigates the puzzling murder of a policewoman, with the only clue to her bizarre death being reports of a stranger in a coonskin hat at the scene of the crime. Hired by a ruthless TV producer to locate the culprit, he discovers the mysterious man is not all he seems - but is soon distracted by the intervention of old acquaintance Carla Borrego. Offbeat detective drama, starring Alan Davies, Julia Sawalha and Adrian Edmondson.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Creek
programme.desc: Jack Dee guest stars as a successful composer who wonders how his new lover has managed to miraculously regrow a full head of hair in just two days. Carla resolves to work it out for herself, while Jonathan finds himself at the centre of some unwanted attention. Light-hearted crime drama, starring Alan Davies and Julia Sawalha.(n)

programme.title: Bring It On: Fight to the Finish
programme.desc: An East Los Angeles high school cheer squad captain finds her hopes of winning the upcoming Spirit Championships dashed when her mother remarries and their family relocates to Malibu, where the current cheer squad isn't quite up to snuff. With their fiery fusion of Latin and hip-hop moves, Lina Cruz (Christina Milian) and her best friends Gloria (Vanessa Born) and Treyvonetta (Gabrielle Dennis) are about to lead the East L.A. high school cheer squad to victory at one of the most prominent competitions in the nation. But just as the crew is about to take the world by storm, Lina's mother remarries and the family makes the move to Florida. Once there, Lina quickly realizes that the Malibu Vista High Sea Lions aren't anywhere near as talented as her old cheer squad. Now, in order to transform the Sea Lions into a championship team, Lina must teach them the moves needed to knock the award-winning Jaguar cheer squad and their trash-talking captain Avery (Rachele Brooke Smith) out of the top spot. When Lina and Avery's brother Evan (Cody Longo) becomes romantically involved, the competition between the two girls really begins to heat up. With the stakes higher than ever before, Lina hatches a scheme to take her team all the way to the top and prove that they have what it takes to become true champions(n)

programme.desc: The guys invite the girls to a Dungeons & Dragons night when their trip to Vegas falls through after an incident with airport security. However, following a few drinks, Sheldon and Amy's relationship takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Raj goes on a date with Lucy, who tries to sneak out of the restaurant's bathroom window - but ends up getting stuck and calling for his help.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: A visitor at the hotel intentionally stirs up trouble between Lily and Robin, and also between Ted and Barney. Meanwhile, Marshall and baby Marvin finally arrive at the Farhampton Inn to join the wedding party. American sitcom, guest starring Andrew Rannells.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall tells the gang about his quest to learn the three mighty virtues of speed, strength and accuracy to master the Slap of a Million Exploding Suns - before delivering a devastating blow to Barney. American sitcom, guest starring Boyz II Men.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Julia tells Nick she does not want to put a label on their relationship, leaving him anxious and disappointed, and she also annoys Jess by refusing to help her get out of paying for a parking ticket. Winston tries to impress a former date, while Schmidt is determined to find out why his towel is always damp. Comedy, starring Lizzy Caplan, Jake Johnson and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess decides to mark her first Valentine's Day as a single woman by going on a meaningless date with a stranger and asks Schmidt to help her find a suitable candidate. Nick's romantic plans are ruined when Julia is overwhelmed with work, while Winston gets a second chance to impress Shelby. Guest starring Ryan Kwanten (True Blood) and Clark Duke (Hot Tub Time Machine).(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max, Caroline and the diner gang work together to get Earl back on stage, when his former band are due to perform an anniversary gig at a music club owned by his ex-girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Caroline is jealous when Max reconnects with an old friend, but an invitation to a weekend away with some fresh acquaintances does not turn out as planned.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is dismayed when the group spends the Thanksgiving holiday at Mrs Wolowitz's house, but hits it off with Bernadette's father. Meanwhile, Penny realises she must deal with a mistake from her past when she and Leonard have an argument. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Grace thinks she knows where Bart is buried, Cindy uses Simone's past against her in the campaign trail, and Darcy manipulates Jesse into asking her to move in. Elsewhere, Courtney finds out that her controlling Grandmother is planning to visit so she decides to go on holiday.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and Barry learn something new about Murray, while Erica's college application has a surprise for Beverly. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes an important decision after Leonard tries to help her in the aftermath of a failed role on a TV show. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart practise talking to strangers at a shopping centre, and Sheldon studies to become a comic genius. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a holiday, and when Penny quits her job the duo end up spending time together. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of his girlfriend's career decision, Bernadette seeks Stuart's help in replacing one of Howard's comic books, and Howard and Raj provide Amy with some advice. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: Tough cop John McClane arrives at an airport to pick up his wife, but finds himself plunged into a bloody life-or-death struggle. He must battle terrorists who have seized control of the terminal as part of a campaign to secure the release of a convicted drug baron. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Sadler, Franco Nero and William Atherton.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Raj take a heartbroken Howard to Las Vegas, where they pay a prostitute to spend time with him. Meanwhile, Sheldon finds himself locked out of his apartment and forced to stay the night at Penny's. With guest star Jodi Lynn O'Keefe (Prison Break).(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Stuart takes Penny out for a second date, during which she drunkenly reveals her true feelings. Meanwhile, Howard uncovers a flaw in the toilet he designed for a Nasa space shuttle, and asks his friends to help him correct it before the launch. Kaley Cuoco, Kevin Sussman and Simon Helberg star.(n)

programme.title: IndyCar Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights of the Grand Prix of Road America, round ten of the Verizon IndyCar Series. Britain's Max Chilton was looking to build on an eighth-place finish last time out in Texas.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Exploring the mountains of Dhofar in Oman, where the annual Indian Ocean monsoon has helped create a lost world of waterfalls and cloud forests filled with fascinating wildlife. The programme shows green sea turtles coming ashore in their thousands, shadowed by egg-stealing foxes, as well as footage of striped hyenas doing battle with Arabian wolves. Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Conquerors
programme.desc: Documentary examining the success of the thriving king crab, one of the largest shellfish, which is depopulating the seabed and changing the balance of species in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor embarks on a journey encompassing Africa, Europe, America and China, meeting some of the world's most skilled fishermen and joining them on angling expeditions in a variety of waters. His first port of call is Costa Rica, where he tries to land the sailfish, said to be the fastest species of them all.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: David Attenborough describes the annual melting of more than three million square miles of Arctic sea ice, which can be perilous for indigenous species. He also assesses fears that the region could be ice-free throughout the summer months in 50 years' time, and speculates on the results for native polar bears, whales and guillemot chicks.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia

Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Wild China
programme.desc: The documentary series exploring China's wildlife continues with a journey to the Yunnan Province, where parallel mountain ranges channel mighty rivers from Tibet southward to the tropics, and the landscape provides a home to diverse species. While the mountain forests are home to red pandas, the valleys below contain jungles inhabited by gibbons, sunbirds and elephants.(n)

programme.desc: The actor embarks on a journey encompassing Africa, Europe, America and China, meeting some of the world's most skilled fishermen and joining them on angling expeditions in a variety of waters. His first port of call is Costa Rica, where he tries to land the sailfish, said to be the fastest species of them all.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: The new moon arrives, and the forest is at its darkest, but that does not stop at Burnt Rock Tower's baby Ardhi attempting to walk.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: A storm is brewing, and as the families prepare for tough times, the White Rock tarsiers are torn between waiting for the return of Poppy and the need to hunt food.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Exploring the mountains of Dhofar in Oman, where the annual Indian Ocean monsoon has helped create a lost world of waterfalls and cloud forests filled with fascinating wildlife. The programme shows green sea turtles coming ashore in their thousands, shadowed by egg-stealing foxes, as well as footage of striped hyenas doing battle with Arabian wolves. Plus, a glimpse into the lives of chameleons, honey badgers and the elusive Arabian leopard.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at which animal could be crowned `king'.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: The changes that have swept across the Arabian peninsula since the discovery of oil. Camel racing has become a hi-tech sport and the region's animals now live alongside a very modern society, but technology is also being used to protect nature. The programme reveals how dugongs are fitted with satellite transmitters and hunting falcons chase down radio-controlled planes, and follows the construction of the world's first carbon-neutral city. Narrated by Alexander Siddig.(n)

programme.title: Conquerors
programme.desc: Documentary examining the success of the fire ant, which has thrived as a result of protecting its territory, confiscating food for itself, and fighting with burning venom.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor grapples with catfish on the Tennessee River, and searches for blackfin tuna drawn to offshore oil production platforms in the Gulf of Mexico. He also tries his hand at the ancient method of bow fishing to catch carp in Nashville - but gets more than he bargained for with the appearance of an alligator gar.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: David Attenborough describes the annual return of half a billion Pacific salmon to the rivers of Canada and Alaska where they were born - and where bears hungrily await them. Every year, the fish travel up to 20,000 miles to spawn and die, swimming upstream and leaping over giant waterfalls as part of an extraordinary natural event that helps sustain the entire ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: Fierce storms continue to rage, and the White Rock Towers family has been trapped at home for two days.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: Mating season arrives in Sulawesi, and the tarsiers of White Rock Tower succumb to its spell.(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots!
programme.desc: A "Top Gun" spoof in which a maverick Air Force pilot is coaxed back into service after giving up military life to live among a tribe of Native Americans. After reenlisting, he's tasked to destroy Iraqi nuclear facilities while dealing with a rival pilot and a manipulative aerospace executive(n)

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: George C Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong, Frank Latimore, James Edwards. Monumental biopic of the great but controversial US military general, George S Patton. The film follows his World War II career from his triumphs over Rommel in North Africa, through his demotion for mistreating a soldier under his command and up to the Battle of the Bulge. George C Scott's towering performance earned him an Oscar, which he refused to accept(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 1. Part 1 of 3. A McCoy is murdered by a Hatfield and a forbidden love affair begins at the start of the legendary Hatfield-McCoy family feud, which nearly brought the American states of Kentucky and West Virginia to civil war in the 1880s(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 2. Part 2 of 3. The Hatfields seek revenge after one of theirs is murdered by a McCoy. When friends and neighbours join the fighting, West Virginia and Kentucky are brought to the brink of civil war(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 3. The Hatfields are forced deeper into the mountains; Johnse Hatfield eyes another McCoy woman; and the fighting between the two families peaks in a New Year's Day battle(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven master gunmen pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing action tale that launched the film careers of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson and James Coburn(n)

programme.title: Sons of Liberty

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: Thriller set in 2047 about a missing spacecraft that turns up seven years after it disappeared, with the crew dead and a strange entity on board. A reconnaissance ship is despatched carrying a group of scientists, including the inventor of the spaceship's engine, a gravity drive motor named the Event Horizon. They soon discover a presence none of them could have expected(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Unless he comes up with $50,000, Peter and his Average Joe's Gym will be swallowed up by White Goodman's bodybuilding empire. His only chance is to take a team of no-hopers to the national dodgeball finals, and a bruising showdown with White. Anarchic comedy(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: After a group of slaves overpower their captors on a ship bound for America, they face a battle in the courts to be seen as humans and not cargo(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A mismatched group of bored suburbanites longing to escape the stress of their daily lives and embrace the freedom of the open road finds that it takes more than polished chrome and leather jackets to truly experience the biker lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: In this delightful animated film, emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A special agent called Harry Tasker skilled in languages and counter intelligence has been leading a double life all his married life. His wife believes that he works for a computer company until she becomes involved with a con artist who likes seducing married women...(n)

programme.desc: From his early years on an Arkansas cotton farm through to superstardom as a country music singer, this moving film charts the fascinating life of Johnny Cash. Biopic(n)

programme.title: Dolph Lundgren Is the Killing Machine
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren directed and stars as an ex-KGB assassin turned investment broker in Canada, where he is forced back into his old line of work after old enemies, a group of Russian gangsters, kidnap his family(n)

programme.title: Day Watch
programme.desc: Timur Bekmambetov's sequel to the Russian fantasy blockbuster Night Watch begins with Anton discovering his son Yegor has gone over to the dark side and is now one of the Great Others, who threatens the truce. When Yegor's tutor Olga is found killed, Anton is accused of murder by the Day Watch but a mind swap between him and the murdered woman offers him a chance of salvation if he can find an ancient warrior's tomb and the legendary Chalk of Fate, which can re-write history. As with the original, Bekmambetov's cinematic visions complement the fantasy of the film, from the start with a stupendous opening battle sequence, providing a feast for the eye as well as the mind. In Russian with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: One More Time. Action adventure series. The team attempt to rescue a general and his daughter from a band of guerrillas(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: After this stunning opening, the action switches to the Himalayas, where tycoon Elliott Vaughn has financed an expedition that will take him to the summit of K2-the world's second highest mountain. Annie is one of Elliott's party. In the face of a threatening storm, Elliott recklessly insists the climb should continue. The storm duly arrives and decimates the expedition, leaving Elliott and Annie stranded. Peter leads a group of climbers-including the grizzled Montgomery Wick and a French-Canadian nurse in a rescue attempt(n)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove Church
programme.desc: A pastor must rescue his estranged son, who is wanted for murder and on the run from a posse. They eventually end up in a small town in Texas, where they found a famous church. Tom Berenger stars in this prequel to the Pulitzer Prize-winning series of Western novels by Larry McMurtry(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: For 60 years, a Tibetan monk has protected an ancient scroll which gives its owner immortality and incredible power. With a new generation of Nazis determined to snatch the scroll, the monk recruits a young pickpocket to help defeat evil(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens ask the unemployed actors of a cancelled science-fiction series to help them win an intergalactic war in this comedy(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: Rousing action drama in which the US Navy's elite commando force, the SEALs (Sea, Air, Land), is sent to rescue hostages from a ship in the Middle East. A plot is uncovered to sell stolen Stinger missiles to terrorists, but when the SEALs launch a surprise attack in Syria to retrieve the armaments, the terrorists become more aggressive and the mission more dangerous, culminating in an invasion of besieged Beirut(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux
programme.desc: In the eagerly anticipated sequel, directed by Jim Abrahams, Charlie Sheen returns as Topper Harley. Sickened by his lfe of violence, Topper retreats to a mysterious Eastern monastery. But when he's asked to head a mission to free the Desert Storm PoWs, he takes up arms again. In what is largely a spoof of the Rambo movies, he's joined by Ramada Hayman, who had previously dumped him, but she must also fight the charms of CIA op Michelle Huddleston. When they've finished, the MIddle East will never be the same again... Edited for content(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: After this stunning opening, the action switches to the Himalayas, where tycoon Elliott Vaughn has financed an expedition that will take him to the summit of K2-the world's second highest mountain. Annie is one of Elliott's party. In the face of a threatening storm, Elliott recklessly insists the climb should continue. The storm duly arrives and decimates the expedition, leaving Elliott and Annie stranded. Peter leads a group of climbers-including the grizzled Montgomery Wick and a French-Canadian nurse in a rescue attempt(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk

programme.title: Black Dynamite
programme.desc: A former CIA operative takes on drug dealers and "The Man" to avenge his brother's murder and clean up the streets in this fun and funky spoof of 1970s blaxploitation movies. Michael Jai White cowrote and stars. Kym Whitley, Tommy Davidson, Kevin Chapman, Byron Minns, Salli Richardson-Whitfield. Directed by Scott Sanders(n)

programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: An undercover cop becomes too close to an Ohio drug lord, ultimately endangering the police operation(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: It is the year 2033 and Tank Girl, runs an army of half-men, half-kangaroo rebels known as the Rippers. Their sworn enemy is Kesslee has turned the world into a desolate wasteland by withholding the now-precious liquid from the majority of the population. Only Tank Girl, with her charm, impudence and sexuality, has the capability of taking Kesslee on, and he should not underestimate the power of a girl and her tank!(n)

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: Liu Jian, a police officer from China, comes to Paris to help the vice squad apprehend a Chinese drug lord and his unknown French connection. The French connection is Richard, the head of the vice squad, who intends to kill the drug lord then frame Jian. Jian ducks a bullet and escapes with a tape of what really happened. By chance, Jian turns to Jessica a US farm girl who is one of Richard's hookers for help. She has her own problems, including the fact that Richard has her daughter locked in an orphanage to keep Jessica on the streets and silent about his activities. Can Jian protect Jessica, rescue he daughter, and give Richard the kiss of the dragon?(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Employee of the Month.
programme.desc: A reserved staff parking space at a department store provides Adrian with the clue he needs to solve the murder of a conscientious sales assistant. While working on the case, he also finds time to clear the name of his disgraced ex-partner Joe Christi. Guest starring Enrico Colantoni (Veronica Mars).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: In a bid to get his old team-mates back together, Patrick decides to pit them against his new work colleagues in a challenge to solve the murder of a fitness trainer. Meanwhile, Lisbon visits Red John's wife Sally at her home, only to discover she has committed suicide. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: One of Patrick's former clients gets in touch with him when her nine-year-old son is kidnapped and demands that he use his psychic powers to help find the child, despite Lisbon's scepticism. The investigation leads to relatives of the boy, but things get complicated when the main suspect is killed.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team are assigned to protect the mayor during a rally about immigration rights. While searching the area, they find the body of a photographer who has been robbed and murdered. The investigation initially seems to point to a homeless man, but when the memory card in the victim's camera is found to have a close-up picture of the killer on it, the team races to prevent an imminent murder.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a girl on an island and discovers the victim had been conducting inquiries into her father's murder. Jane gathers the town residents for a meeting and tells them he knows the killer is among them, but his suspicions are badly received by the locals. Starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates when the daughter of a congresswoman is raped and murdered in her home, and is drawn into a seedy underworld. The evidence prompts her to examine the victim's sexual predilections - and uncovers a secret that could make her the next victim. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda is called on to investigate when a judge is carjacked and murdered. Despite having a long list of witnesses, the one person she's certain can help is the victim's autistic son.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The murder of a gay man stirs political tension in the city, and Chief Pope tasks Brenda with bringing the killer to justice. However, she also has to contend with internal conflicts in the department, as Taylor undermines her authority and a team member actively works against her.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The daughter of a wealthy family's housekeeper is raped and murdered, and the authorities are quick to point the finger of blame at a known sex offender. However, Brenda is convinced there is more to the case than meets the eye, and struggles to overcome her own beliefs and concoct a logical explanation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. DiNozzo discovers that National Security Agency analyst Ellie Bishop wrote a report two years previously predicting the possibility of such an occurrence and she is brought in to assist with the investigation and track down the culprit. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger becomes Steve's legal guardian, but his overzealous approach to parenting gets his adopted son's school principal fired. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine decide to make their own fun at the world's biggest water park.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan persuades his last single friend to get married so he can realise his dream of becoming a best man, but when he invites an ex-convict to the wedding, she jeopardises the event. Elsewhere, Ricky Martin causes Roger to doubt himself.(n)

programme.title: Shots Fired
programme.desc: Cory reveals crucial information about the night Joey was killed, allowing Preston and Ashe to refine their list of suspects. Crime drama, starring Sanaa Lathan and Stephan James.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter tries to help Meg in her bid to become a reporter for the school newspaper by writing an article falsely claiming actor Luke Perry, who guest stars as himself, is gay. Meanwhile, Stewie builds a device that brings Chris under his power. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Mila Kunis.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and his friends go on an extended drinking binge in a bid to win a tour of the local brewery - but their bad behaviour lands them in trouble with owner Pawtucket Pat, who bears more than a passing resemblance to Willy Wonka. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine encourages Stan to open up emotionally, but gets more than she bargained for when he reveals a dark secret concerning the fate of a neighbour's husband. As the revelations continue to emerge, Roger takes it upon himself to play psychiatrist to the pair.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is asked to smoke out a former KGB agent and is shocked to discover the spy has not only moved in next door, but has also converted Steve into a communist. Meanwhile, Klaus is caught smuggling drugs on his way to France.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: A girl at a day-care centre steals Stewie's heart, and Peter persuades Lois to become a flight attendant so he can enjoy the benefits of free air travel around the world. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter gets on the wrong side of socially inept gangster Big Fat Paulie, putting Lois in the sights of a hitman. The Griffins visit the Mob boss on the day of his daughter's wedding in the hope that he will call off the killing. Animated comedy, with the guest voice of Michael Chiklis.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan returns home from another dangerous mission to find Francine and the family have decorated the house for Christmas. Deciding their efforts do not live up to his high standards, he sets out to find the perfect tree, but meets an untimely end during his search, and battles the forces of evil to save his loved ones and earn another chance at life.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine pretends to kidnap Roger after he has a fight with Stan, hoping to demonstrate how much he means to the family. However, when her agent husband refuses to pay the ransom, the alien is forced to rethink the way he treats people.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: He's Too Sexy for His Fat.
programme.desc: Chris grows increasingly uncomfortable with his weight and visits a cosmetic surgeon to arrange liposuction. However, it is Peter who ends up having the procedure - and his new appearance causes him to become vain and self-obsessed.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter learns his house on Spooner Street is not officially a part of the United States, and decides to take drastic action - by establishing his own country and declaring war on America.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The Smith family stars in a spoof of classic James Bond films. Stan sets out to stop producer Tearjerker (played by Roger), who has devised a diabolical scheme to make movies so depressing that anyone who watches them will ultimately die of despair.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine feels threatened when her mother-in-law seeks Stan's support after breaking up with her latest boyfriend, so she enlists Roger to solve her meddling relative's romantic woes.(n)

programme.desc: Jane suspects a blogger's fascination with serial killers may have led him to commit murder in an attempt to achieve a twisted kind of fame. programme.desc: Brenda struggles to gain control of an investigation into the murder of a businessman and is eventually partnered on the case by Fritz. However, she discovers the FBI has ulterior motives, putting their friendship under further strain. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Liam Neeson reunites with Unknown director Jaume Collet-Serra) for this airborne thriller about an Air Marshal racing to stop the villain who has framed him as a hijacker during a non-stop flight from New York to London. From the moment we first meet Air Marshal Bill Marks (Neeson), it's apparent his nerves are frayed. After furtively knocking back a stiff drink in the airport parking lot, he enters the crowded terminal to board a plane bound for London. Carefully observing his fellow travelers along the way, Marks eventually ends up seated next to nervous flyer Jen (Julianne Moore), who begins to breathe easier once she's seated near a window. Later, as the plane hits cruising altitude, Marks receives a mysterious text message stating that a passenger on the flight will be killed every 20 minutes unless $150 million is deposited into a secure bank account. But the harder Marks works to identify a suspect, the deeper he implicates himself in what becomes a deadly hostage crisis unfolding at 30,000 feet over the Atlantic Ocean. When it's revealed that the account for the ransom money is in Marks' name, the FAA revokes his marshal status and the media paints him as a hijacker. As the frightened passengers begin to turn on Marks, he suspects the true culprit may not even be on the plane. And with the help of Jen and perceptive airline hostess Nancy (Michelle Dockery), he attempts to clear his name and protect the passengers by any means possible(n)

programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Ford's Western, with John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish.(n)

The spell means he can only speak another 1,000 words in his life - and when the words run out, he will die. The only way to break the enchantment is to put right all his past mistakes. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy receives his great uncle's ashes, which are accompanied by some cryptic advice about affairs of the heart. Ronnie Corbett stars.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Lionel and Jean return from a weekend away to find Judith's boyfriend has been staying at the house. To add to their woes, Alistair announces he has got engaged to a girl named Mercury - dashing their hopes of his ever becoming their son-in-law. Comedy starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: A persistent door-to-door salesman makes grouchy Victor Meldrew see red - and an unending stream of junk mail through his letterbox threatens to push him over the brink into insanity. Richard Wilson, Annette Crosbie and Angus Deayton star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Chaos abounds at an annual parade held to celebrate a famous battle. The lifelike effigy of the old General has been spruced up and Nora Batty prepares to sit on a float playing the part of his wife. Norman Wisdom makes a cameo appearance.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Lionel has a habit of being unpredictable, but when he walks off and abandons his wife while out on a drive in the hills, it is left to Clegg, Truly and Billy to console her. Long-running comedy set in Yorkshire, from the pen of Roy Clarke. Roy Hudd guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Billy celebrates his ancestor Robin Hood's birthday by proudly wearing a green suit, and gullible Barry pays tribute in his own way - much to the amusement of everyone else. Long-running comedy set in Yorkshire, from the pen of Roy Clarke. Keith Clifford and Mike Grady star.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A nagging toothache forces a reluctant Del to visit the dentist, but he gets more than he bargained for when the receptionist falls for him and embarks on a Fatal Attraction-style campaign to get her hooks into him. Meanwhile, Cassandra's plan to have a baby takes its toll on Rodney, who has never been so exhausted in all his life. Christmas special from 1993.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Hapless uncle Bryn organises a special treat for Gwen's birthday. However, his supposedly covert actions do not go as unnoticed as he would like, and an unexpected guest arrives. Meanwhile, Stacey tries to summon the courage to tell Gavin of her big decision.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Comedian, actor and presenter Jason Manford hosts an evening of stand-up at the Apollo in Hammersmith, London, treating the audience to his own brand of humour, before introducing routines by Geordie favourite Chris Ramsey and the multi-talented Doc Brown.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark grows concerned that Jeff and Sophie's work trip to Aberdeen could turn into something intimate, and attempts to stop them hooking up together. Meanwhile, Jeremy gets a new girlfriend - but is seized by fits of jealousy whenever she looks at another man. Starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: The Young Ones
programme.desc: The students plan a spectacular protest to prevent council officials demolishing their house. First-ever episode of the anarchic comedy. Rik Mayall, Adrian Edmondson, Nigel Planer and Christopher Ryan star, with Alexei Sayle and mod band Nine Below Zero.(n)

programme.title: Blackadder
programme.desc: Edmund tries to have Harry appointed Archbishop of Canterbury - a position sure to cost him his head - but panics when he is given the job himself. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson and Brian Blessed.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Comedian, actor and presenter Jason Manford hosts an evening of stand-up at the Apollo in Hammersmith, London, treating the audience to his own brand of humour, before introducing routines by Geordie favourite Chris Ramsey and the multi-talented Doc Brown.(n)

programme.title: Big School
programme.desc: It's talent show time at Greybridge School, with the staff providing the acts while the pupils pull off their best Simon Cowell impressions. Mr Church is reluctant to enter until Miss Postern suggests a duet with her, although artistic differences look set to ruin their chances. PE teacher Mr Gunn seems favourite to win with his Keith Lemon impersonation - before some unexpected late entries throw the competition wide open. Classroom comedy, starring David Walliams, Catherine Tate, Philip Glenister and Frances de la Tour.(n)

programme.title: French and Saunders
programme.desc: Comedy sketches with Dawn and Jennifer, including a parody of Ingmar Bergman's film The Seventh Seal. Guest starring Rowland Rivron.(n)

programme.title: Little Britain
programme.desc: Dubious transvestite Emily hits the town with her friend Florence to celebrate her last night as a single `laydee'. Dudley is unimpressed by the arrival of Ting Tong's mother, and Sid Pegg calls an urgent Neighbourhood Watch meeting when he learns a rogue caravan has moved into the area. Comedy sketches, starring Matt Lucas and David Walliams.(n)

programme.title: Sorry

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean begins to think that, 19 months after tying the knot, her marriage may have become stale. She wonders whether a few surprises from Lionel would spice things up, so Alistair, helped by Judith and Sandy, comes up with a plan to give her the treat of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor and Margaret set off for a break by the seaside - but the discovery of a dead gull in their boarding-house bathroom sets the scene for what turns out to be a weekend of sheer hell. Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Who's That with Barry and Glenda?.
programme.desc: Truly jumps to the conclusion that Barry is up to no good after he is spotted acting suspiciously, but his real motive for being in the woods with a suitcase is unfathomable. Long-running comedy, staring Mike Grady, Frank Thornton and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg, Truly and Alvin take a group of pensioners to a farm for the day, but their act of charity backfires when it becomes clear the elderly daytrippers are not happy with the idea.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Barry Becomes a Psychopathic Killer but Only Part-Time.
programme.desc: Smiler finds himself pursued by a wanton gold-digger who thinks he's rich, but luckily Truly is full of ideas to solve the problem. Stephen Lewis and Frank Thornton star.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Fletch plans to bring a bit of Christmas spirit to Slade Prison in the form of his own home-made booze. But when Mackay and Barraclough uncover the stash in his cell, the crafty con seems in danger of spending the yuletide period in solitary confinement. Festive edition of the classic comedy from 1976, starring Ronnie Barker and Fulton Mackay.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The remaining four chefs from an earlier heat who have yet to face their skills test are challenged by Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace to shape rolls, baguettes and four-plait loaves from bread dough. They then recreate Michel Roux Jr's fish soup made with champagne, as well as a classic dish of their own choosing, before Monica and Michel decide which three contestants will advance to the quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The remaining bakers test their dessert-making skills as they embark on a series of challenges. After serving up cheesecake and chocolate roulade for judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, this quarter-final showstopper sees the cooks creating a croquembouche - a choux pastry tower made of hundreds of profiteroles. Presented by Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: John Torode and Gregg Wallace present the fourth heat. The six hopefuls begin by dishing up their calling card, a single plate of food that represents who they are, followed by the invention test, in which they prepare a dish in one hour from a choice of two sets of surprise ingredients. After two cooks are sent home, things get serious, with the rest preparing dinner for 2009 MasterChef winner Mat Follas and Tom Rennolds and Daksha Mistry, finalists from 2012 and 2006 respectively. It's then down to the judges to decide which two will advance to Friday's quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers explore how Mediterranean cuisine and ingredients have influenced British culinary culture since it was first introduced by the Romans, and prepare their favourite recipes.(n)

programme.title: Ottolenghi's Mediterranean Feast
programme.desc: Chef Yotam Ottolenghi continues his culinary journey as he visits four of the Mediterranean's most beautiful islands, including Sardinia, Majorca and Crete. He begins on the French island of Corsica, where he discovers how its lush green landscape flavours the food, from cheese to honey, and meets its most celebrated chefs. He also prepares recipes including roasted fish with aromatic Corsican olive oil, Swiss chard and herb tart with local cheeses, honey and apricot trifle with walnuts and lavender, chestnut cake and a rich veal stew.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Australia
programme.desc: Part two of two. The MasterChef judge immerses himself in the food culture of Sydney's Lebanese community, before he enjoys a spot of fine dining.(n)

programme.desc: The remaining bakers test their dessert-making skills as they embark on a series of challenges. After serving up cheesecake and chocolate roulade for judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, this quarter-final showstopper sees the cooks creating a croquembouche - a choux pastry tower made of hundreds of profiteroles. Presented by Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: John Torode and Gregg Wallace present the fourth heat. The six hopefuls begin by dishing up their calling card, a single plate of food that represents who they are, followed by the invention test, in which they prepare a dish in one hour from a choice of two sets of surprise ingredients. After two cooks are sent home, things get serious, with the rest preparing dinner for 2009 MasterChef winner Mat Follas and Tom Rennolds and Daksha Mistry, finalists from 2012 and 2006 respectively. It's then down to the judges to decide which two will advance to Friday's quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The remaining four chefs from an earlier heat who have yet to face their skills test are challenged by Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace to shape rolls, baguettes and four-plait loaves from bread dough. They then recreate Michel Roux Jr's fish soup made with champagne, as well as a classic dish of their own choosing, before Monica and Michel decide which three contestants will advance to the quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers explore how Mediterranean cuisine and ingredients have influenced British culinary culture since it was first introduced by the Romans, and prepare their favourite recipes.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Michel Roux Jr oversee proceedings as six chefs battle it out in the quarter-final, preparing a dish of their own invention from a range of ingredients including neck of lamb, rabbit, chorizo and rhubarb. Only four contestants will make it to the next challenge, in which they have to cook two courses for food critics William Sitwell, Tracey MacLeod and Charles Campion - with two going through to the semi-finals.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Remaining contestants Holly, Janet, Jo and Mary-Anne test their pastry-making skills in the next set of challenges. After serving mousse cake and iced fingers to judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood, the cooks create a dough capable of being used in three types of pastry or croissant. Presented by Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Six more amateur cooks compete for a place in tomorrow's quarter-final. They prepare a plate of food that represents who they are as their calling card and choose one box of ingredients - either sweet or savoury - to rustle up a surprise dish in the invention test after John Torode demonstrates what he would do with the same produce. Two are then sent home, leaving the remaining four to serve dinner for Natalie Coleman, Dhruv Baker and James Nathan, MasterChef champions in 2013, 2010 and 2008 respectively, before Gregg Wallace and John decide which pair have made it through.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers prepare dishes from their favourite cookery books, explaining their value as social documents that reveal a great deal about people and what they ate. The duo meet Ivan Day, who has one of the most extensive collections of recipe books in the UK, and share stories of renowned food writers such as Elizabeth David and Isabella Beeton.(n)

programme.title: Ottolenghi's Mediterranean Feast
programme.desc: Chef Yotam Ottolenghi travels to Majorca, the largest of Spain's Balearic Islands. He leaves the busy beaches behind as he heads inland in search of local cuisine and discovers a larder of local ingredients including roast suckling pig, tomatoes sweetened on the vine and oranges. He prepares a feast of Spanish and Moorish origin, featuring salt-crusted fish with fennel, a sweet and salty salad of caramelised oranges with goat's cheese and a dessert of apricots, almonds and raisins. He also discovers ruby red prawns in the coastal town of Soller, which become the key ingredient in his deconstructed paella.(n)

programme.title: John Torode's Australia
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part episode filmed in Tasmania, the MasterChef judge goes diving for the luxury seafood abalone, makes sushi and prepares a naval feast.(n)

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: Inspired by The Canterbury Tales, as well as the story of Ulrich von Lichtenstein, this is the story of William, a young squire with a gift for jousting. After his master dies suddenly, the squire hits the road with his cohorts Roland and Wat. On the journey, they stumble across an unknown writer, Chaucer. William, lacking a proper pedigree, convinces Chaucer to forge genealogy documents that will pass him off as a knight. With his newly-minted history in hand, the young man sets out to prove himself a worthy knight at the country's jousting competition, and finds romance along the way(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence is one of America's top black comedians, spoken of in the same breath as the late Richard Pryor and Eddie Murphy when they were at the height of their stand-up powers, and he's also appeared in films including Big Momma's House and Bad Boys. But he's also suffered setbacks in his personal life, from being arrested with a loaded gun at an airport to being accused by his co-star in the TV show Martin of sexual harassment. In this outstanding film of his stand-up routine, he confronts his demons and those who demonise him, as well as veering off to his favourite subject: women, and how hard they are to live with. And 'rundletat' is short for 'run and tell that'(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: A rich Wall Street player basks in his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a murderous monster(n)

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Drama based on the life and career of the young Mexican-American singer who was murdered just as she was on the verge of crossing over from the Tejano pop scene to the mainstream. From her early start to her success at 17, the film follows Selena's progress, until she was shot by the woman who ran her fan club(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. The buxom adventurer travels to some exotic locales, where she battles a variety of fantastical creatures with the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this comic-book adventure set in the 1980s, the X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Two years after saving the world with the Autobots, Sam Witwicky is heading off to university when an ancient Decepticon named The Fallen returns to Earth seeking revenge. Their home planet of Cybertron rendered uninhabitable, the Autobots begin working with the military to hunt down any remaining Decepticons. Meanwhile, Sam and Mikaela race to unlock the secret history of the Transformers on Earth in order to save the planet from the most-formidable Decepticon to date(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Romantic drama set in World War II about an American military pilot who travels to Britain to fight in the war in Europe but goes missing in action. Assuming he is dead, his girlfriend and best friend - who are stationed together in Hawaii - become romantically involved, but things become complicated when he comes back alive, just in time for the devastating Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: The nations of Earth band together to fight off a second alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the alliance readies itself for a massive war(n)

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documents written by the Founding Fathers—the Declaration of Independence, the U.S. Constitution and the Bill of Rights—are read by living presidents and vice presidents, members of Congress, diplomats, celebrities and middle-school students from the United Nations International School. David McCullough narrates(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documents written by the Founding Fathers—the Declaration of Independence, the U.S. Constitution and the Bill of Rights—are read by living presidents and vice presidents, members of Congress, diplomats, celebrities and middle-school students from the United Nations International School. David McCullough narrates(n)

programme.title: Making of 'War for the Planet of the Apes'
programme.desc: A look at "War for the Planet of the Apes," a 2017 thriller about an ape army's struggle against homo sapiens. The film stars Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn, and is directed by Matt Reeves(n)

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Paralysed in the Vietnam War, a disillusioned soldier becomes a political activist on the front line of a campaign to support human rights. Based on the biography of patriot, turned political activist, Ron Kovic(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, now-brotherless Blues Brother Jake Elwood puts the band back together with the help of a golden-voiced strip joint bartender and a precocious 10-year-old orphan on loan from the comically abusive Sister Mary Stigmata. This hysterical sequel to the original Blues Brothers comedy/musical makes good use of its copious celebrity cameos, which include appearances from old schoolers James Brown, Aretha Franklin, Eric Clapton, Bo Diddley, and Isaac Hayes(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: Set in South Carolina in 1964, this is the tale of Lily Owens a 14-year-old girl who is haunted by the memory of her late mother. To escape her lonely life and troubled relationship with her father, Lily flees with Rosaleen, her caregiver and only friend, to a South Carolina town that holds the secret to her mother's past. Taken in by the intelligent and independent Boatwright sisters, Lily finds solace in their mesmerizing world of beekeeping(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Along with her best friend, American teenager Mia Thermopolis (Anne Hathaway) travels to Genovia after their high-school graduation to take up her duties as a princess. But her life is turned upside down when she not only learns that she is to take the crown as queen earlier than expected, but that she is also to be married before this event. Queen Clarice asks that Mia be allowed time to find a husband, and she is given 30 days. However, greedy Viscount Mabrey will try to do what he can to stop that. He wasn't counting on the fact that his nephew has met Mia and they are both attracted to each other'(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a chauvinistic advertising executive who acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking. He attempts to use his power to bring about the fall of his new female boss, but love begins to bloom between them and he finds himself feeling more than a little guilty when his plan to have her sacked looks as though it may come to fruition(n)

programme.title: Nights in Rodanthe
programme.desc: Escaping a broken marriage, Adrienne Willis travels to the North Carolina town of Rodanthe where a chance meeting with troubled doctor Paul Flanner leads to a life- changing love affair(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: When a space station crew refuses to return home, Dr. Chris Kelvin is sent to find out what's going on. When he arrives, most of crew has disappeared, and Chris is visited by a replica of his late wife who is imbued with her memories. Remake of the acclaimed 1972 film and adapted from Stanislaw Lem's novel(n)

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: Eva Longoria Parker, Paul Rudd, and Lake Bell star in first-time feature filmmaker Jeff Lowell's heavenly romantic comedy concerning a female psychic and a doubtful skeptic who find their fledgling love affair thwarted by the latter's recently deceased fiancée. Henry (Rudd) and Kate (Longoria Parker) were all prepared to live out their "happily ever after" when tragedy struck from out of nowhere and Kate was killed on their wedding day. In the aftermath of the accident, a devastated Paul reluctantly takes his sister's advice and pays a visit to local psychic Ashley (Bell). Now, despite the fact that he openly questions her ability to communicate with the dearly departed, Paul can't help but fall head over heels in love with Ashley. Despite the fact that the feelings are most certainly mutual, however, their growing relationship is threatened when Kate makes it her supernatural mission to sabotage the happy couple's fledgling relationship before it starts to get serious(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence is one of America's top black comedians, spoken of in the same breath as the late Richard Pryor and Eddie Murphy when they were at the height of their stand-up powers, and he's also appeared in films including Big Momma's House and Bad Boys. But he's also suffered setbacks in his personal life, from being arrested with a loaded gun at an airport to being accused by his co-star in the TV show Martin of sexual harassment. In this outstanding film of his stand-up routine, he confronts his demons and those who demonise him, as well as veering off to his favourite subject: women, and how hard they are to live with. And 'rundletat' is short for 'run and tell that'(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: A rich Wall Street player basks in his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a murderous monster(n)

programme.title: Selena
programme.desc: Drama based on the life and career of the young Mexican-American singer who was murdered just as she was on the verge of crossing over from the Tejano pop scene to the mainstream. From her early start to her success at 17, the film follows Selena's progress, until she was shot by the woman who ran her fan club(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. The buxom adventurer travels to some exotic locales, where she battles a variety of fantastical creatures with the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this comic-book adventure set in the 1980s, the X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Two years after saving the world with the Autobots, Sam Witwicky is heading off to university when an ancient Decepticon named The Fallen returns to Earth seeking revenge. Their home planet of Cybertron rendered uninhabitable, the Autobots begin working with the military to hunt down any remaining Decepticons. Meanwhile, Sam and Mikaela race to unlock the secret history of the Transformers on Earth in order to save the planet from the most-formidable Decepticon to date(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Romantic drama set in World War II about an American military pilot who travels to Britain to fight in the war in Europe but goes missing in action. Assuming he is dead, his girlfriend and best friend - who are stationed together in Hawaii - become romantically involved, but things become complicated when he comes back alive, just in time for the devastating Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: The nations of Earth band together to fight off a second alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the alliance readies itself for a massive war(n)

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documents written by the Founding Fathers—the Declaration of Independence, the U.S. Constitution and the Bill of Rights—are read by living presidents and vice presidents, members of Congress, diplomats, celebrities and middle-school students from the United Nations International School. David McCullough narrates(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documents written by the Founding Fathers—the Declaration of Independence, the U.S. Constitution and the Bill of Rights—are read by living presidents and vice presidents, members of Congress, diplomats, celebrities and middle-school students from the United Nations International School. programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Paralysed in the Vietnam War, a disillusioned soldier becomes a political activist on the front line of a campaign to support human rights. Based on the biography of patriot, turned political activist, Ron Kovic(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, now-brotherless Blues Brother Jake Elwood puts the band back together with the help of a golden-voiced strip joint bartender and a precocious 10-year-old orphan on loan from the comically abusive Sister Mary Stigmata. This hysterical sequel to the original Blues Brothers comedy/musical makes good use of its copious celebrity cameos, which include appearances from old schoolers James Brown, Aretha Franklin, Eric Clapton, Bo Diddley, and Isaac Hayes(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: Set in South Carolina in 1964, this is the tale of Lily Owens a 14-year-old girl who is haunted by the memory of her late mother. To escape her lonely life and troubled relationship with her father, Lily flees with Rosaleen, her caregiver and only friend, to a South Carolina town that holds the secret to her mother's past. Taken in by the intelligent and independent Boatwright sisters, Lily finds solace in their mesmerizing world of beekeeping(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Along with her best friend, American teenager Mia Thermopolis (Anne Hathaway) travels to Genovia after their high-school graduation to take up her duties as a princess. But her life is turned upside down when she not only learns that she is to take the crown as queen earlier than expected, but that she is also to be married before this event. Queen Clarice asks that Mia be allowed time to find a husband, and she is given 30 days. However, greedy Viscount Mabrey will try to do what he can to stop that. He wasn't counting on the fact that his nephew has met Mia and they are both attracted to each other'(n)

programme.title: Nights in Rodanthe
programme.desc: Escaping a broken marriage, Adrienne Willis travels to the North Carolina town of Rodanthe where a chance meeting with troubled doctor Paul Flanner leads to a life- changing love affair(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: When a space station crew refuses to return home, Dr. Chris Kelvin is sent to find out what's going on. When he arrives, most of crew has disappeared, and Chris is visited by a replica of his late wife who is imbued with her memories. Remake of the acclaimed 1972 film and adapted from Stanislaw Lem's novel(n)

programme.title: Over Her Dead Body
programme.desc: Eva Longoria Parker, Paul Rudd, and Lake Bell star in first-time feature filmmaker Jeff Lowell's heavenly romantic comedy concerning a female psychic and a doubtful skeptic who find their fledgling love affair thwarted by the latter's recently deceased fiancée. Henry (Rudd) and Kate (Longoria Parker) were all prepared to live out their "happily ever after" when tragedy struck from out of nowhere and Kate was killed on their wedding day. In the aftermath of the accident, a devastated Paul reluctantly takes his sister's advice and pays a visit to local psychic Ashley (Bell). Now, despite the fact that he openly questions her ability to communicate with the dearly departed, Paul can't help but fall head over heels in love with Ashley. Despite the fact that the feelings are most certainly mutual, however, their growing relationship is threatened when Kate makes it her supernatural mission to sabotage the happy couple's fledgling relationship before it starts to get serious(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates

However, a pair of hard-partying ladies (Anna Kendrick and Aubrey Plaza) see a viral video in which they plead for dates, and decide to pretend to be the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip. Directed by Jake Szymanski(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Teambuilding Exercise. Jared worries about Richard when he reaches out to an unlikely ally; Gilfoyle gets serious about security after Dinesh's latest dalliance; Erlich grows concerned about Jian-Yang's commitment to his app(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: The Keenan Vortex. Richard ponders a deal with the tech world's latest "it" boy; Jack faces setbacks(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Hooli-Con. Erlich goes on a trip to get his mojo back while the guys head to Hooli-Con, where Jared faces a moral dilemma; Gilfoyle and Dinesh are distracted by Keenan; and Richard becomes obsessed with an ex's new beau(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Server Error. In the Season 4 finale, Richard's caught in a web of lies in a last-ditch attempt to save Pied Piper. Meanwhile, Jared plans his exit when he's worried about Richard's future; Jack tries to change the narrative; and Gavin plots his comeback(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: Dan Savage; Richard A. Clarke; Dan Abrams; Katty Kay; Michael Steele
programme.desc: Dan Savage; Richard A. Clarke; Dan Abrams; Katty Kay; Michael Steele. Advice columnist Dan Savage; counter-terrorism expert Richard A. Clarke. The roundtable guests are legal analyst Dan Abrams, news anchor Katty Kay and political analyst Michael Steele(n)

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Enthralling biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 07-02-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (2008) Danny Boyle's eight Oscar- and seven BAFTA-winning blockbuster opens as Jamal Malik (Dev Patel), a chaiwalah at a call centre, is on the verge of winning 20 million rupees on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? . But the host of the show, Prem Kumar (Anil Kapoor) is convinced he's cheating and hands him over to the police to beat the truth out of him. Jamal reveals that the right answer to each question has come from a significant part of his life, from when he and his brother Salim were orphaned after their mother was killed in religious violence. As he continues his story, Jamal reveals how he knows each answer; how he fell in love with Latika, an orphaned girl from whom he was later separated; and how his brother Salim took the path of violence as a gangster's gunman. But as Jamal is returned to the studio for the last question, Salim finally repays his brother's trust. As well as the outstanding Patel, Jamal is played in different stages of his life by Tanay Hemant Gharu and Ayush Mahesh Khedekar; Salim is played by Madhur Mittal, Ashutosh Lobo Gajiwala and Azharuddin Mohammed Ismail; Latika is played by Frieda Pinto, Tanvi Ganesh Lonkar and Rubina Ali, all of whom turn in stunning performances. English/ Hindi with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck pals become arms dealers, but get in over their heads when they land a $300 million contract with the U.S. government to supply weaponry to forces in Afghanistan. This raucous comedy-drama is based on true events(n)

programme.title: Bend It like Beckham
programme.desc: The comic tale of a young Asian woman who joins the local semi-professional football team but opts not to tell her traditionalist family, who want her to go to law school and settle down with a nice Indian boy. She finds it increasingly difficult to deal with her double life as a dutiful daughter and a talented footballer(n)

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: A 3-D concert film of the 2008 Jonas Brothers Burning Up concert tour, as well as documentary footage on the lives of the three brothers(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Tom Stoppard provided the witty and intelligent script for John Madden's romantic comedy in which young Will Shakespeare struggles with writer's block and money worries while trying to complete Romeo and Ethel: The Pirate's Daughter. Gwyneth Paltrow once more employs her faultless English accent, playing aristocratic Viola de Lesseps, who is shortly to be married off but yearns to slum it as an actor. Disguising herself as a boy in order to be allowed on stage, Viola becomes Will's muse, and the more familiar tale of Romeo and Juliet begins to take shape as the couple fall passionately in love. The film is littered with knowing lines and energetically supported by a stellar cast, including Judy Dench as Queen Elizabeth - a cameo performance which earned her one of the movie's seven Oscars(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: (2005) Enchanting children's fantasy, based on the classic novel by CS Lewis. When young World War Two evacuee Lucy Pevensie hides in an old wardrobe during a game of hide and seek, she finds herself transported to the magical land of Narnia, locked in eternal winter by the evil White Witch. Her siblings do not believe her when she tells them of this strange new world, but they are soon in Narnia themselves, fighting alongside the noble lion Aslan to defeat the witch and her mighty army.Dir: Andrew Adamson. (T) (Digital Dolby 5.1)(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Four years after they left school, three old pals team up for a road trip from Georgia to California. Mimi's got dreams of Hollywood, Kit's looking forward to seeing her beau, but Lucy wants escape...and maybe to find the mother she's never met(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are arrested before they have even committed their crime, thanks to the forecasting of 'pre-cogs'. Detective John Anderton thinks the system is perfect... until he's arrested. Brilliant sci-fi thriller based on a story by Philip K Dick(n)

programme.title: Term Life
programme.desc: A thief takes his estranged daughter on the lam when a job goes awry in this intense thriller. As crooks and corrupt cops close in on them, he also takes out a life-insurance policy on himself in an effort to leave something behind for his daughter(n)

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: One windy day in New York, Connie Sumner literally bumps into Paul Martel. She's happily married with a child, he's a dealer in rare books. When invited to his flat to repair the damage caused by their sidewalk collision, he makes a move on her, but she declines and leaves. However, she's now intrigued by him and it's not long before she returns to him and embarks on a passionate affair. But Connie's not the best liar in the world, and her businessman husband Ed, thinking her story doesn't stack up, hires a private investigator to keep tabs on her. When the detective's evidence confirms Ed's fears, it thrusts the three main players on the road to tragedy..(n)
